narration: Did you know Hans Zimmer composed Interstellar's epic docking scene music on a church organ? The piece, 'No Time for Caution,' was so intense that it moved actors to tears during filming. Now that's some powerful movie magic!
videoPrompt: Start with a dramatic view of a church organ with sunlight streaming through stained glass windows. Transition to an intense docking scene with spaceships maneuvering in space. Close with actors on set, visibly moved, wiping tears. Photorealistic with a dramatic, cool color palette.
ytDesc:
Discover how Hans Zimmer's use of a church organ created an unforgettable moment in Interstellar.
